markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Garuda Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2291) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Plumekith](/Feats.aspx?ID=2285)

</column>

---

You are descended from the wondrous [garudas](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1162), and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess. You can cast [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) and [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Garuda Magic
